item.title: Compendium NPC Template
item.description: Summary The poltergeist bartender of Trollskull Tavern. Good friends with [[]] and the The Trollskull Team. Background

item.title: Davil Starsong (Deceased)
item.description: Summary Master of Opportunities and Negotiations of the Zhentarim Founding member of the Doom Raiders Sun Elf Rogue with an affinity for magic Does most of his business in the taproom of the Yawning Portal

item.title: Durnan
item.description: Owner and proprietor of the Yawning Portal Known Closed Lord of Waterdeep Middle Aged man who despite looking tired and haggard still has a sharp mind and a sharper sword - Grimvault Background Durnan is the owner and proprietor of the Yawning Portal.

item.title: Istrid Horn
item.description: Summary Master of Trade and Coin of the Zhentarim Operates an illegal lending operation out of a heavily guarded warehouse in the Dock Ward Founding member of the Doom Raiders Open to working with the party Party Notes

item.title: Manshoon
item.description: Summary An archwizard who hired the Doom Raiders’ mercenary group The Black Network in order to found the Zhentarim Like many wizards pushing the boundaries of magical experiments, Manshoon eventually ran in the very non-magical problem of resources.

item.title: NPCs
item.description: %% Begin Waypoint %% Belle Cassalanter Family Davil Starsong (Deceased) Durnan Istrid Horn Lif Manshoon Renear Skeemo Weirdbottle Tashlyn Yafeera Vajra Safahr Ziraj the Hunter %% End Waypoint %%

item.title: Renear
item.description: Member of the The Trollskull Team Father was the Open Lord Dagult Neverember, Open Lord before Larael Silverhand. Dagult embezzled a treasure of a million gold pieces and encoded it’s location in the Stone of Golorr

item.title: Skeemo Weirdbottle
item.description: Summary Skeemo became the Master of Magic for the Zhentarim, setting up a cover in the Trades Ward in the form of a cramped little shop called Weirdbottle’s Concoctions.

item.title: Tashlyn Yafeera
item.description: Summary Tashlyn is Master of Arms and Mercenaries for the Zhentarim. In this role, she provides armor, weapons, and training to sellswords on the Black Network’s payroll.

item.title: Vajra Safahr
item.description: Summary As the High Wizard of Waterdeep, she is charged with using all the magic and resources at her disposal to defend the city against threats.

item.title: Ziraj the Hunter
item.description: Summary A burly half orc paladin and one of the original members of the Doom Raiders Loyal to anyone who shows him kindness Good Friends with Chad Background Race: Half Orc Faction: Doom Raiders Abilities: Arrow Paladin Party Relationship Party fled from Ziraj’s huge arrow bolts through the city as they fled Gralhund Villa with the Stone of Golorr Chad and Ziraj struck up a friendship
